articles.author: Michael Birnbaum, Cat Zakrzewski, Ellen Francis
articles.title: Vance meets with leader of far-right German party, exports MAGA message - The Washington Post
articles.description: The vice president delivered a scolding speech advocating that Europe move over to accommodate the rising anti-migration, nationalist voices they have sought to block from power.
articles.content: MUNICH JD Vance made his vice-presidential debut on the global security stage Friday in a scolding speech here, pressing Europes centrist leaders to move over to accommodate the rising anti-migration… [+9999 chars]
